new_feature_requests.summary: Fix the canister stopped error (IC0408) occurring during Internet Identity login that shows 'The replica returned a rejection error: Reject code: 5, Reject text: Canister ohbdn-3yaaa-aaaah-a46oa-cai is stopped'
Ensure the backend canister ohbdn-3yaaa-aaaah-a46oa-cai is running and properly configured to accept requests from the Internet Identity authentication flow

projectName: Fix Internet Identity canister stopped error on login
